meanings.definition: To mark as paid by giving a receipt.
meanings.sent1: She receipted the payment for the goods.
meanings.sent2: The cashier receipted all the invoices at the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The teacher receipted the homework assignments with a smile.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic receipted the repair job with precision.
meanings.sent5: He receipted the bill, ensuring all details were accurate.

meanings.sent1: The receipted document confirmed the purchase.
meanings.sent2: She felt relieved holding the receipted paper in her hand.
meanings.sent3: The receipted envelope was safely tucked away in the drawer.
meanings.sent4: The receipted package was proof of delivery.
meanings.sent5: He proudly displayed the receipted ticket for the event.
